description: Number of ways of getting no pair, a pair, 2 pair, 3 of a kind, other straight, other flush, full house, 4 of a kind, other straight flush, royal flush or 5 of a kind in 5-card poker when joker is wild.
references: J. Scarne, Scarne's Complete Guide to Gambling, Simon and Schuster, 1961, p. 585.
R. L. Frey, "According to Hoyle", Fawcett, 1956, p. 32.
links: Index entries for sequences related to poker
author: _Rob Pratt_, Feb 23 2000.
extensions: Several versions of this sequence have been published! A014404, A053080, A053081 and A053082 are correct.
